reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable, and well-made, with a lightweight material that flatters the body by hiding stomach areas. The dress receives positive feedback for its color, with one customer specifically mentioning its perfect pink shade. The fit receives mixed reviews, with some finding it perfect while others say it's slightly big, and customers disagree on whether it's see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! Itâ€™s incredibly flattering, even on my fluffy side, and fits like a dream. Comfortable, stylish, and perfect for any occasion. I feel confident and cute â€”highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress... Highly recommended
items.body: This wine red dress is everything I hoped for and more! The color is rich, elegant, and exactly as picturedâ€”it looks even better in person. The fabric feels luxurious, and the fit is so flattering, hugging in all the right places without being uncomfortable. I wore it to a special event, and I felt so confident and beautiful the entire night. I got so many compliments, and people kept asking where I got it! The craftsmanship is excellent; it looks far more expensive than it actually is. If youâ€™re looking for a dress thatâ€™s timeless, chic, and makes you feel like a million bucks, this is the one. I couldnâ€™t be happier with my purchase! Read more
items.author: Monique Coleman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The wedding guest dress
items.body: Needed a dress appropriate for an all black wedding and BINGO! I came across this one which was nice and flowy. The material is nice and breathable which is good if you get hot like I do. The sleeves are quarter length I believe which was ok because you were able to see my accessories such as my bracelets and watch. I honestly believe the sleeves were a bit short than quarter length. I would love to have to try another color in the future Read more
items.author: TaTiana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Closet staple
items.body: This dress is so cute and flattering. It did not have to be ironed and looked great straight out of the dryer. Also, the length is good. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and it hit right above my knee. Read more
items.author: Brooke Gilbert

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but Iâ€™m not sure about the fabric
items.body: Looks pretty nice on fabric seems nice quality but to me seemed to thin Read more
items.author: Kasia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
items.author: Jasmine Ezell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!
items.body: I have to say. I LOVE THIS DRESS! I bought it in wine... wore it so many times I decided to buy it in emerald green. Pink (which is sheer you need a slip) and now it navy blue.. I love this shops dresses. It fits the chest. The length of the pink one was short. But mostly all it just above knee. I'm 5'3. And bigger and it covers all my "flawed" areas with elegance will buy again.... clearly ðŸ˜‚ Read more
items.author: ShaMoM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Flowly and Fit Perfectly
items.body: I'm 5'7 and about 250 lb. I wore this for a wedding I love the fit it was super flowy and perfect. I'm kind of in that era where I'm not down to where like garters and spandex. And I'm just loving my body as is. Although I think that I probably could have used it underneath this dress because that's certain angles I feel like it wasn't super flattering to my midsection but I also feel like I could have pulled my midsection in more. But overall I was a great dress for the price I ordered two dresses and ended up keeping this one and returning the other one. The material for this company is not super thick but it's not super thin either. It's not see through but I feel like it definitely could have been a little bit more stretch to the material of a more softness it's not necessarily rough but it's just not buttery either. But for the price the quality and the material it served its purpose. It was a fun dress to spin around in at the end of the night. Read more
items.author: Alex Jae

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lake Blue, Pink, Rust, White, Purple, Burgundy, Hot Pink, Black, Navy Blue, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
